title: RIP Henny? Dick WAR CRIMES Cheney Is Back! 08.08.22
itunes:title: RIP Henny? Dick WAR CRIMES Cheney Is Back! 08.08.22
description:
In episode 1304, Miles and guest co-host DJ Danl Goodman are joined by legendary podcaster and host of Shameless Acquisition Target, Laura Mayer, to discuss… DARTH VADER HAS ENTERED THE CHAT, Warner Bros. New CEO Sucks, HENNY IS DEAD TO RAP--IT’S ALL CASAMIGOS and more!

  1. DARTH VADER HAS ENTERED THE CHAT
  2. Warner Bros. New CEO Sucks
  3. David Zaslav Is HBO Max's Public Enemy #1
  4. Backlash Over Return-To-Office Mandate Sparks Culture Clash Debate In Wake Of Discovery-WarnerMedia Merger
  5. Why Warner Bros. Killed ‘Batgirl’: Inside the Decision Not to Release the DC Movie
  6. Batgirl and First Kill being cancelled proves that Hollywood doesn’t care about queer women
  7. ‘Batgirl’ Was Shelved, Despite Costing $90 Million to Make...and We Have Questions
  8. Warner Bros. Discovery Leadership Team Draws Ire Over Diversity
  9. HENNY IS DEAD TO RAP--IT’S ALL CASAMIGOS

LISTEN: Turn On The Lights again... (feat. Future) by Fred again...

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
